Turnkey hosting

We procure the hardware, install and set it up. In case of breakdowns, we repair it. We provide insurances to minimize your risks.

Green and affordable electricity

We use carbon neutral hydroelectric power at very competitive rates. Our energy capacity and price offerings ensure profitability of your operations.

Legal and stable mining

We stive to maintain fully compliant operation within dynamically changing legal frameworks of all countries where our customers reside.

For beginners and pros

Our mission is to provide best quality service for those who are new to mining, by guiding and explaining at every step. Professional miners will find personalized approach and very responsive support personnel.
